markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Landslide](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2978)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living landslides resemble humanoids made of earth and gravel. They find moving across the many surfaces of the mortal [Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26) strangely liberating.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Living_Landslide.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Living Landslide](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2978)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=585" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 142 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Petran](/Languages.aspx?ID=109)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Earthbound** When not touching solid ground, the living landslide is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 90

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Crumble <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The living landslide takes damage from a hostile source while atop rock or earth** **Effect** The living landslide crumbles into the ground, [Burrowing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310)down 10 feet. This Burrowing does not trigger reactions. The living landslide can't Crumble again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, burrow 25 feet; earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 bludgeoning

**Earth Glide**   The elemental can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310) through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the elemental moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

**Sliding Earth** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The living landslide Strides up to twice its normal Speed in a straight line, then attempts to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) a creature in its reach. If a creature falls prone from this Trip, it takes 1d4 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet the living landslide moved.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-409" />
name: Living Landslide
